addr: 199 Chambers Street. (Up ramp and through front doors, Theater to the left of the security desk). New York, NY 10007
title: BMCC Student Film Festival Fall '15
desc:
Hey everyone! Its almost time again for our bi-annual student film festival! 
 We are expecting a great line-up this year, with a variety of genres and styles of film. 
 We hope to see you there supporting the film community at BMCC!
